Writers.

Di Golding

Di got most of her film education the old fashioned way - by working at an independent video store (for more years than she's willing to admit). She studied scriptwriting at Algonquin College, and comedy screenwriting under SCTV scribe Dave Flaherty of Humber College. She is a replacement film columnist for CBC Radio Ottawa, and LiVE 88.5FM, and is a regular contributor for Ottawa Magazine. She has what psychiatrists and her husband would describe as an 'unhealthy obsession' with Jeff Bridges. She has exactly one IMDb credit.

By Di Golding
